english.segment1: Like the water's roar. Is Your voice, O Lord. There is none before. And none beside
english.segment2: You are set apart. You alone are God. Your glory reaches far. From sky to sky
english.segment3: Holy, Holy, Lord God Almighty. Early in the morning we will sing. Holy, Holy, we bow down before Thee. All Your children love to sing Your name. God Almighty
english.segment4: You're the breath of life. You're the God on high. Your song shall rise. And never pass away
english.segment5: O, Your Majesty. Evermore shall be. The earth, the skies, the sea. Shall bring You praise
english.segment6: And I hide my eyes. With my face to the ground. In the presence of Your Majesty. And I clap my hands. And I lay my crowns. In the presence of Your Majesty.
